org.giiwa.bean

类 User

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.giiwa.dao.Bean
      • org.giiwa.bean.User
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>

    public class User
extends Bean
    The User Class is base user class, all the login/access controlled in giiwa was depended on the user, it contains all the user-info, and is expandable.
    table="gi_user"
    MOST important field 
     id: long, global unique,
 name: login name, global unique
 password: string of hashed
 nickname: string of nickname
 title: title of the user
 hasAccess: test whether has the access token for the user
    作者:
    yjiang
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  User.Lock
      The Lock Class used to record login failure log, was used by webgiiwa framework.
      static class  User.UserRole

      • create

        public static long create(java.lang.String name,
                          Helper.V v)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a user with the values,
        if the values contains "password" field, it will auto encrypt the password field.
        参数:
        v - the values
        返回:
        long of the user id, if failed, return -1
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - throw Exception if name or password not matches the setting

      • load

        public static User load(java.lang.String name,
                        java.lang.String password)
        Load user by name and password.
        参数:
        name - the name of the user
        password - the password
        返回:
        User, if not match anyoone, return null

        返回:

      • update

        public static int update(long id,
                         Helper.V v)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        update the user by the values,
        if the values contains "password" field, it will auto encrypt the password field.
        参数:
        id - the user id
        v - the values
        返回:
        int, 0 no user updated
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • update

        public static int update(Helper.W q,
                         Helper.V v)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        update the user by query
        参数:
        q - the query
        v - the value
        返回:
        the number of updated
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

        参数:

      • failed

        public int failed(java.lang.String ip,
                  java.lang.String sid,
                  java.lang.String useragent)
        record the login failure, and record the user lock info.
        参数:
        ip - the ip that login come from
        sid - the session id
        useragent - the browser agent
        返回:
        int of the locked times

      • logout

        public int logout()
        record the logout info in database for the user.
        返回:
        the int

      • logined

        public int logined(java.lang.String sid,
                   java.lang.String ip,
                   Helper.V v)
        record login info in database for the user.
        参数:
        sid - the session id
        ip - the ip that the user come from
        v - the V object
        返回:
        the int
